		Question: what makes elvis presley famous

answer:
Here is the answer to this question:

Elvis Presley is famous because of his contribution to music and his cultural impact. He is known as "The King of Rock-and-Roll" and is one of the most popular and influential artists of all time. Presley was born in Tupelo, Mississippi, on January 8, 1935, and grew up in Memphis, Tennessee. He began singing at a young age and began performing in gospel choirs. In 1954
